title: Council Decision of 12 July 2011 appointing a member of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for Hungary
header:
14.7.2011 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 208/3
COUNCIL DECISION
of 12 July 2011
appointing a member of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for Hungary
2011/C 208/02
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1365/75 of 26 May 1975 on the creation of a European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions (1), and in particular Article 6 thereof,
Having regard to the lists of candidates submitted to the Council by the Governments of the Member States and by the employees’ and employers’ organisations,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decisions of 22 November 2010 (2) and 7 March 2011 (3), the Council appointed the members and alternate members of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for the period from 1 December 2010 to 30 November 2013, with the exception of certain members and alternate members.
(2) The Government of Hungary has submitted a nomination for one post to be filled,
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed member of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for the period ending on 30 November 2013:
GOVERNMENT REPRESENTATIVES
Country Members Alternates
Hungary Mr Péter CSÁNYI
The Council will appoint the members and alternate members who have not yet been nominated at a later date.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 2011.
For the Council
The President
J. VINCENT-ROSTOWSKI
(1)  OJ L 139, 30.5.1975, p. 1.
(2)  OJ C 322, 27.11.2010, p. 8.
(3)  OJ C 83, 17.3.2011, p. 4.
